name: No. 9 (Deep Blue In Roman Red)
description:
Part of a collection of color field items, this item is about my recent trip to Ravenna (capital in 540 ac. of the Roman Eastern Empire) and the beauty of its ancient Byzantine art.

A departure from Greco-Roman classical forms full of depth and soaked in naturalism, and a move toward flatness and mystery. The intent is now to depict that which we cannot see – the intangible world of Heaven and the spiritual.

The shapes and the colors of this piece recall the tonality of ancient mosaics and the noble presence of one of the longest-lasting empires in human history.
